main event: A radar observation of unidentified flying objects (UFOs) off the coast of Bermuda in July 1954.
interesting points: The UFOs were detected on radar for approximately 12 minutes,The observed objects were definitely identified as being U.S. Navy ships according to confirmation from the Navy,Photos taken from radar screens indicate multiple UFOs were detected,The radar operator could not conclusively identify the objects as any known type of aircraft; an aerial search found no visible aircraft,The sighting was consistent with other reports of circular formations of objects in the sky.
